sentence.Network_en: Only native - born citizens are eligible for the U.S. Presidency.

sentence.Network_en: Almost all its native - born Americans came from east of the Mississippi.
sentence.Network_cn: 而几乎所有生于本土的美国人都来自密西西比河以东.

sentence.Network_en: Others fret that hard - working migrants will undercut the wages of the native - born.
sentence.Network_cn: 由肯尼迪所代表的那些人说美国应该欢迎那些辛勤工作的移民.
